div.p: Rate coefficients (logarithmic scale) plotted as a function of temperature for the CO(1)+N 2(0) â†’ CO(0)+N 2(1) transition. Present work results (solid line) compared to the experimental ones up to 300 K of Allen and Simpson ( 1980) (red circles) and those calculated in Kurnosov et al. ( 2003) using different potentials (dashed lines with points).
